divs: Sighting DetailsWhile letting my dog out last night to use the bathroom. I stood at the back door waiting for her. All a sudden I saw a bright reddish orange light whiched looked like it came from the front of the house. It scanned across the patio which lite up the whole patio.It headed to the back of the patio and toward the back of the yard. My dog saw it and ran as fast as she could to the door. I let her in and quickly closed the back door. It was to scared to look outside.
Summary: while letting my dog outside on patio a bright red light hovered over the patio. it lite the whole patio up.
